text: Manila in the Claws of Light () is a 1975 Filipino drama movie directed by Lino Brocka and was based on the novel In the Claws of Brightness by Edgardo M. Reyes. It stars Rafael Roco, Jr., Hilda Koronel, Lou Salvador, Jr., Tommy Abuel, Joonee Gamboa, Tommy Yap. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 drama movies Category:Filipino movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Lino Brocka Category:Movies set in the Philippines
title: Manila in the Claws of Light
